title: Membership benefits
htmlText:
• Belong to a world class association of like minds and contribute to shape thoughts and conscience of peoples for next generation
    â€“ be noticed and heard.
  • Receive our periodical/journal that educate and inform on data collection techniques, scientific methodologies and analytics etc.
  • Enjoy a rebate/reduction on conference fees/seminars
  • Receive certificate of membership that gives impetus to industry professionals.
  • Network with international colleagues that opens door to greater learning ideas, and improve your business or career.
